definitions.definition: A badge of office, rank, or power.
The lowest grade of commissioned officer in the United States Navy, junior to a lieutenant junior grade .
A flag or banner carried by military units; a standard or color / colour .
The principal flag or banner flown by a ship (usually at the stern) to indicate nationality.
A junior commissioned officer in the 18th and 19th centuries whose duty was to carry the unit's ensign.

main_definition: A badge of office, rank, or power.
secondary_definitions: The lowest grade of commissioned officer in the United States Navy, junior to a lieutenant junior grade .
A flag or banner carried by military units; a standard or color / colour .
( nautical ) The principal flag or banner flown by a ship (usually at the stern) to indicate nationality.
( historical ) A junior commissioned officer in the 18th and 19th centuries whose duty was to carry the unit's ensign.
